definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: tear apart, away (NH remove (load, etc.), Pi.separate, take to pieces; Ar. faraqa split, divide;; Targum [[פְּרַק]] esp. redeem, rescue; Syr. praq withdraw (intrans.), also remove, rescue; Eth. faraqa: set free);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 2 ms [[וּפָרַקְדָמתּ֫]] Ge 27:40; Impf. 3 ms sf. [[וַיִּפְרְקֵנזּ]] Ps 136:24; Pt. act. [[פּׂרֵק]] La 5:8, Ps 7:3 tear away yoke from pff ([[מֵעַל]] neck Ge 27:40 (J); snatck from ([[מִן]]) foes, = rescue (Aram.) La 5:8, Ps 136:24; so abs. Ps 7:3 (prefixing [[זֵין]]([[וְ]]), Targum SyrVer Che Du We), > Hup Bae al. snatch away as prey.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms [[יְפָרֵק]] Zec 11:16 he shall tear off their hoofs; Imv. mpl. [[פָּֽרְקוּ]] Ex 32:2 (E) tear off the golden ear-tings; Pt. [[מְפָרֵק]] 1Ki 19:11 a great wind rending mts. (‖ [[מְשַׁבֵּר]]).

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: tear off (for, i.e. from, oneself Ges:§ 54 f); Impf. 3 mpl. [[וַיִּתְפָּֽרְקוּ]] Ex 32:3 (E), c. acc. [[אֶת־נִזְמֵי הַזָּהָב]]; Imv. mpl. [[הִתְפָּרָָקוּ]] v:Ex 32:24 (E; obj. om.); pass. be broken off, Pf. 3 pl. [[הִתְפָּֽרְקוּ]] Ez Eze 19:12 (branches).
